1104:677: ka iva ? krīḍāphalasukhepsuvat dyūtādikrīḍāyā yatphalaṃ sukhaṃ tadāptumicchuriva||
1104:679: sukhārtha kriyate karma tathāpi syānna vā sukham|
1104:680: karmaiva tu sukhaṃ yasya niṣkarmā sa sukhī katham||63||
1104:683: tathāpi evaṃ cetasā pravṛttāvapi kasyacit karmaṇo'bhivāñchitaphalaṃ syāt,
1104:686: tathāpi karmārambhāt punaḥ phalasaṃbhāvanayā naiva nivartate janaḥ|
1104:689: sa niṣkarmā karmavirahitaḥ kathaṃ sukhī syāt ?
1104:698: kṣuradhārāmadhūpamaiḥ kṣuradhārāyāṃ yanmadhu madhurasaṃ yadāsvādya tṛṣṇāvaśājjihvocchedanottarakālaṃ duḥkhamupajāyate,
1104:713: kathamiva ? yathā grīṣmasamaye madhyaṃdinavartini sūrye sarvato jalamalabhamānaśca ātāpatāpito hastī paramābhiniveśasaṃyuktaḥ atiśayavadāhlādakāriśītalajalaparipūritaṃ hadamāsādya prathamato nimajjati tathā iti samudāyārthaḥ|
1104:720: ārabdhakarmaniṣpādane sāmarthyakṣayamātmano'vagamya sāmarthyapratilambhe sati punaḥ kariṣyāmi ityabhiprāyeṇa tāvatkālaṃ parityajet muñcet|
1104:725: anyathā svarasavāhitayāpi tasmin pravṛtte punarvyāpārādvikṣepa eva syāt|
1104:727: etena yaduktaṃ prāk-pūrvaṃ samīkṣya sāmagrīm [7.47] ityādi,
1104:729: tadevamavāntaraviśeṣopadarśanena balavyūhaṃ sarvathābhidhāya prathamoddeśapratipāditamapi punaśchandādigaṇe [7.16] kathitaṃ tātparyaṃ vyācakṣāṇa āha-
1104:737: atra nidarśanamāha-yathā śikṣitena śastravidyākauśalasamanvāgatena śatruṇā saha nipuṇataraḥ khaṅgena saṃgrāmayan tamabhibhavati,
1104:742: tatra tasmin khaṅgayuddhe yathā khaṅgaṃ hastāt kathaṃcit vicalitaṃ punaḥ saṃvṛtya gṛhṇīyāt samayaḥ,
1104:751: nanu sūkṣmakleśasamudācāre'pi kā kṣatiḥ yena tatra upekṣā na kriyate ityatrāha-
1104:756: yathā hi svalpavraṇe'pi rudhirasaṃparkavato viṣasya śarīre|
1104:761: yathā kaścit puruṣaścaṇḍanṛpājñayā tailaparipūrṇapātramādāya picchalasaṃkrameṇa asihastai rājapuruṣaiḥ bindumātratailabhraṃśe'pi adyaiva tvāṃ prāṇairviyojayiṣyāma iti bruvāṇairadhiṣṭhito gacchan yadi mamātra kathaṃcit skhalitaṃ syāt,
1104:762: tadā nūnamamī māṃ vyāpādayeyuriti maraṇabhayāttatparo bhavati,
1104:763: tathā vratī gṛhītasaṃvaraḥ prakṛtaskhalite narakādiduḥkhatrāsāt tadanavakāśāya tatparaḥ syāt yatnavān bhavet||
1104:767: yata evam, tasmādutsaṅgage kroḍagate sarpe āśīviṣe yathā tvaritamevottiṣṭhati-mā māmayamahirdakṣīt,
1104:768: tathaiva nidrālasyāgame middhastyānaprādurbhāve pratikurvīta tatpratipakṣānityatādibhāvanaya pratīkāraṃ kuryāt||
1104:769: asya caivaṃ yatnavato'pi kathaṃcit kiṃcit skhalitaṃ śūraskhalitanyāyena syāt|
1104:773: kathaṃ karomi yenedaṃ punarme na bhavediti||72||
1104:774: smṛtipramoṣe sati ekaikasmin pratyekaṃ chale skhalite kathaṃcit kleśānāmanupraveśe sati paritapya adhyāśayena manastāpaṃ kṛtsna vicintayet-aho bata jānanneva skhalito'smi,
1104:775: tatkena prakāreṇātra pratividhānaṃ karomi yena punaridaṃ chalaṃ na syāt ?
1104:777: na tu punaḥ śithilaḥ syāditi bhāvaḥ||
1104:780: ācāryopādhyāyatadanyasabrahmacāriprabhṛtibhiḥ bahuśrutaiḥ tripiṭakavedibhiḥ kaukṛtyavinodanakuśalaiḥ saha saṃsargaṃ samavadhānamicchedāśaṃset|
1104:787: kena vidhinā nāma āsu avasthāsu kleśāvatāradaśāsu smṛtyabhyāso bhavet,
1104:790: ayaṃ samudāyārthaḥ-kalyāṇamitrasaṃnidhānāt tadavavādānuśāsanītaḥ tadācārasaṃdarśanācca sadā smṛtisaṃprajanyavihāriṇaḥ kleśā nāvatāraṃ labhante|
1104:791: tato'sya avirodhata eva utsāho vardhata iti yuktam|
1104:792: sadā kalyāṇamitraṃ ca jīvitārthe'pi na tyajet| iti|
1104:803: yathā karmāgamāt karmārambhāt pūrvaṃ prāgeva sajjaḥ āyattīkṛtaḥ sudāntāśvavat tanmārganirīkṣaṇāsīna iva karmaṇi pravartate||
1104:807: tūlakaṃ karpāsādisamudbhūtaṃ yathā vāyorgamane ca āgamane ca vaśamāyattam,
1104:808: tathā tadvadeva utsāhavaśaṃ yāyāt vīryavaśavartī bhavet|
1104:810: parātmasamatāparātmaparivartane punaḥ ubhayatrāpi upayukte iti dhyānaparicchede eva vyākhyeye||
